data.name: Smash The Rebels Soundtracs
data.detailed_description:
This music DLC contains 3 soundtracs from Smash The Rebels:

1. City under Attack (length 3 min, mp4)
2. Defend The Base (length 3 min, mp4)
3. Whispering Shadows (length 3 min, mp4)

After purchasing this DLC, you can access these files directly from RTS Commander launcher or from your files root (for example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ and seek RTSMUSIC.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This DLC includes 3 soundtracks in MP4-file format (high quality). Music from Smash The Rebels game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: This is music DLC (mp4-files), so it will run any computer or device which can play mp4.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
